item.title: Creating a website with hugo
item.description: How to create a website using hugo How this site is built This site is built using hugo. Hugo is a framework for building static html from markdown pages, a theme, and a configuration file for the theme. Markdown is relatively easy to understand and much friendlier to users than html. The configuration file is just a text file containing settings and the theme is some prebuilt html and javascript.
